1011001110101010 1111000011001100 1 -> sum: 1010010001110111, cout: 1
1001111000110111 0010000011001110 1 -> sum: 1011111100000110, cout: 0
0101011000100000 1001010100011101 1 -> sum: 1110101100111110, cout: 0
0100011001101010 0001011111001110 0 -> sum: 0101111000111000, cout: 0
1001001001001011 0001001111111110 1 -> sum: 1010011001001010, cout: 0
0101110011011001 1101101100101011 1 -> sum: 0011100000000101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
